document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Me, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffb218">change! </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Me, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ecff56">alter! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Then </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">will, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">when </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">on </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#4c54ff">Everlasting </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8474ff">Hill </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">A </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c06cff">Smaller </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0d4a0">Purple </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#94b8f8">grows </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">At </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#489cff">Sunset, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">or </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e088ff">lesser </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c89430">glow </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c89430">Flickers </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">opon </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0e05c">Cordillera </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">At </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#489cff">Day's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5080ff">superior </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0e05c">close! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Me change! Me alter!
